case_circumstances: Body of decomposed male found floating in middle of Christina River near South Market Street Bridge Wilmington, Delaware.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body:
White or grey tank top shirt.

Black belt, silver colored rectangular buckle.
Rustler brand black colored mens pants.  Has white with black lettering cloth label with wording “87625CB, 34 X 32, L928-023, 100% Cotton, Made in USA” and Rustler brand brass colored metal pants button with wording “Rustler”, photographed at examination following exhumation performed 04/13/12.
case_footwear: Black work-style, lace-up boots. “Dickies” manufacturer label on tongue of boot photographed at examination following exhumation performed 04/13/12.  White socks.
case_jewelry: Silver colored metal Medical Alert necklace with metal alert pendant. Medical symbol on front. Words “HEART PATIENT” engraved on back. Photographed at examination following exhumation performed 04/13/12.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
